verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:10
verses.text: But when that which is perfect is come, then that which is in part shall be done away.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:11
verses.text: When I was a child, I spake as a child, I understood as a child, I thought as a child: but when I became a man, I put away childish things.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:12
verses.text: For now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face: now I know in part; but then shall I know even as also I am known.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 13:13
verses.text: And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.
